name: GMTK2022 Casino
description:
Basic synopsis: You’ve been separated from your friends at the casino, but as you search for them you realize that something isn’t right about this place… Will you be able to resist temptations to find a way out?

The casino project was an ambitious endeavor that unfortunately we were not able to complete due to deadline constraints and many different real-world issues. We still gave it our all and are proud of the work we managed to accomplish. 

Credit goes to:

  • Fluffle - 2d/3d asset generation, material edits, UV unwraps, Static Mesh scene building.
  • Ian 'Rinzii' Pike - 2d paper book movement, AI behavior tree, and camera work
  • Helium - Slot Machine roller coded animations, intractable work for game triggers and input into game mechanics.
  • KrlSmnk - Back-end systems: Skill checks, dice rolls, enemy sense triggers, random dungeon tile generation, HUD layout,  and back-end stat triggers.
  •  Fatal7x  - Decals graphics, modification to existing blueprints for integrations, asset imports and merge conflicts, menu options, and creative direction.
  • KevinRayMusic - Default background music played during levels. 🔥
